attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many Telephone providers offer all calls in UK to 01 or 02 numbers are "free" within the package bought. A call to an 0845/0870 number raises a charge and we petition that when such numbers are shown as "Contact Us" numbers the Coy/Orgaisation should also provide a full landline number to avoid many telephone subscribers paying for an 0845/0870. Angus & Catherine Strachan

rejection.details: Hello, unfortunately I have to reject your petition again. At the moment you have your names "Angus Strachan, Catherine Strachan" in the title of the petition. Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
